word: PAGE 58. LETTER TO BROTHER S: ANOTHER LETTER DEALING WITH THIS SUBJECT, ADDRESSED TO MR. CALDWELL, AN ARDENT DISCIPLE OF MR. STANTON AND ONE WHO JOURNEYED TO AUSTRALIA TO CARRY THE NEW MESSAGE OF "THE LOUD CRY" OF THE THIRD ANGEL TO ELLEN WHITE AND TO SOLICIT HER SUPPORT IN THE MOVEMENT, IS PUBLISHED IN SELECTED MESSAGES, BOOK 2, PAGES 63-71.
